message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to me. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire such a high-quality item at a reduced cost. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further.

Alice, thank you for the offer, but $950,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm really interested in this product, but my maximum budget is $1,000,000. Would you be willing to come down to that price?  It's a fair value for both of us.
